EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card
Exhaust.
Choose

AbstractDepartmentCard.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the corresponding card when have 3/5 LP.

Dummy.DESCRIPTION: A dummy abnormality used to train soon-to-be managers.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Training Standard Dummy Rabbit
Gain 5 Block.
NULL.

Scorched.NAME: F-01-02
Scorched.DESCRIPTION: I am coming to you. You, who will be reduced to ashes like me.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Scorched Girl
Ethereal. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Increase the damage by 1 for each card in your hand.
Receive 30 damage when this card be exhausted.

OSAHOGD.NAME: O-03-03
OSAHOGD.DESCRIPTION: It feeds on the "evil" that surfaces during conversations.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: One Sin and Hundreds of Good Deeds
Uncontrollable: Remove a random debuff of yours.

QueenOfHatred.NAME: O-01-04
QueenOfHatred.DESCRIPTION: In the name of love and justice, here comes Magical Girl!
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Magical Girl
The Queen of Hatred
Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Heal !M! HP.
If you played cards less than 3 in a turn, increase this card's cost by [E]. Reset when this card is played.
Reduce this card's effect by half if cost more than 1. If this card's cost more than 2 when drawn, discard your hand except this.

HappyTeddy.NAME: T-04-06
HappyTeddy.DESCRIPTION: Its very first memory starts from a warm hug.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Teddy Bear
Happy Teddy Bear
Deal !D! damage. Then draw 1 card.
If you play same type card in succession, Exhaust it.

RedShoes.NAME: O-04-08
RedShoes.DESCRIPTION: The girl begged in tears. "Mister, please cut off my feet..."
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Red Shoes
In this turn whenever you play a Attack, lose 1 HP and gain !M! Strength.
If this card is in your hand at the end of your turn, give a random Attack card Exhaust.
Until that card is exhausted, deal damage to you equals to its base damage at the end of your turn and this card can't be play.

OldLady.NAME: O-01-12
OldLady.DESCRIPTION: She was so talkative before. In the end, loneliness was the only listener.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Old Lady
Deal !D! damage.
When this card in your hand, whenever you play another card, increase this card's cost by [E]. Reduce this card's cost by [E] when played.

WallGazer.NAME: F-01-18
WallGazer.DESCRIPTION: Her unbearable sorrow grew long, mournful hair over time.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Wall Gazer
Uncontrollable: Remove a random buff from a random enemy.
Uncontrollable: Lose 2 HP.

NothingThere.NAME: O-06-20
NothingThere.DESCRIPTION: And many skins yelled only one word. "**".
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Nothing There
Whenever you deal damage, heal HP equals to 20% of damage.
When battle starts or shuffle your draw pile, remove a random card and shape this card into it.
If you play this card, receive 30 damage. Then remove a random card and shape this card into it..

MHz.NAME: T-06-27
MHz.DESCRIPTION: This is a record of the day that we must never forget.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 1.76 MHz
Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand.
Increase this card's cost by [E] [E] when play. Reduce this card's cost by [E] when drawn.
If this card's cost more then 2, will distort other cards.

SingingMachine.NAME: O-05-30
SingingMachine.DESCRIPTION: But nothing was like a music it makes when it eats a human.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Singing Machine
Deal !D! damage. If your HP more then 20%, lose 4 HP and deal more 50% damage.
When this card in your hand, whenever you exhaust a card, give a random card Exhaust.
Until those cards are exhausted, exhaust a random card at the end of your turn for each card.

SilentOrchestra.NAME: T-01-31
SilentOrchestra.DESCRIPTION: The world’s most beautiful concert starts from the ruined.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The Silent Orchestra
Uncontrollable: Draw a card.
At the end of your turn, remove all your debuffs, exhaust all your Curse and Status.
Shuffle a first movement into your draw pile at the start of battle. When you draw a movement, exhaust it and shuffle next movement into your discard pile.
When all movements are exhausted, remove all debuffs and heal all HP for all enemies. Then shuffle a first movement into your draw pile.

Woodsman.NAME: F-05-32
Woodsman.DESCRIPTION: This is a forest full of hearts. No matter how many times he cuts down the hearts, the forest remains dense.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Warm-Hearted Woodsman
Whenever an enemy dies, heal !M! HP.
When this card in your hand, the second and subsequent Skill you played this turn will be exhausted.
Whenever a Skill is exhausted by this card, receive !D! damage.

SnowQueen.NAME: F-01-37
SnowQueen.DESCRIPTION: Ices are melting... We don't know if it's because spring is coming or the palace is crumbling.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The Snow Queen
Apply 1 Slow. Exhaust.
Freeze a random card in your hand when this card is exhausted(Increase its cost by 9). Then put a Duel into your hand.
Duel need to choose another Attack to start, with high damage Attack have a higher chances of winning.
If you success, unfreeze the card and heal 3 HP for you. Or exhaust that card and chosen Attack.

BigBird.NAME: O-02-40
BigBird.DESCRIPTION: A month later we concluded, there was no such thing as the beast.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Big Bird
Every 3 Attack you play will apply 1 Vulnerable.
Whenever you play !M! cards, mark a random card which in the same pile with this card. Play the marked card can cancel the mark.
Marked card will be exhausted at the end of second turn.
(There will be a hole above marked card)

LittleHelper.NAME: T-05-41
LittleHelper.DESCRIPTION: Blood covered the floors, people were running away.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Little Helper
Uncontrollable: 对所有敌人造成 !D! 点伤害.
在打出1次后激活.
若回合结束此卡在你手中, 对你造成25%伤害. 在激活状态下打出也会触发此效果.

WhitesApple.NAME: F-04-42
WhitesApple.DESCRIPTION: When the day a ripe apple fell off the tree in the garden where the princess and the king stood, the witch's heart was shattered.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Snow White's Apple
Uncontrollable: 你的所有卡获得1次 保留 机会. 虚无 .
此卡被消耗时给予你 !M! 点力量, 将1张寄生永久加入你的牌组.

SpiderBud.NAME: T-02-43
SpiderBud.DESCRIPTION: Unsurprisingly, not a single employee volunteered to retrieve the corpse of their cocooned colleague.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Spider Bud
Uncontrollable: 抽 !M! 张卡.
打出时将消耗牌堆顶的1张卡.
每因上一效果消耗1张卡, 此卡抽卡量提升1.(最多提升5)

BeautyBeast.NAME: F-02-44
BeautyBeast.DESCRIPTION: But the curse continues, never removed.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Beauty and the Beast
获得 !B! 点 格挡 .
此卡打出后将获得 消耗 .
此卡被消耗时,将1张随机卡变为此卡的复制.

PlagueDoctor.NAME: O-01-45
PlagueDoctor.DESCRIPTION: I shall cure you, depriving of every disease and injury you possess.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Plague Doctor
每当你 消耗 1张卡, 恢复 !M! 点生命.
当你累计 消耗 11张卡后...

WhiteNight.NAME: T-03-46
WhiteNight.DESCRIPTION: Rise, my servants. Rise and serve me.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: WhiteNight
每当你 消耗 1张非"Sacred"卡, 恢复 !M! 点生命.(可以被"Bucket"激活)
免疫你受到的低于6点的伤害.(不包括生命流失)
你无法因此卡外的任何方式回血, 每次造成伤害恢复1点生命.
若此卡回合结束在你手中, 你失去4点生命, 将所有被 消耗 的使徒加入你的抽牌堆.
战斗开始时, 将3张使徒加入你的抽牌堆. 若你的卡组中没有"The Heretic", 将1张随机卡永久变为"The Heretic".

Rudolta.NAME: F-02-49
Rudolta.DESCRIPTION: With my infinite hatred, I give you this gift.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Rudolta
将1张随机卡加入你的手牌.
若回合结束时此卡在你手中, 你失去1点生命.

QueenBee.NAME: T-04-50
QueenBee.DESCRIPTION: If you feel a sharp pain in the stomach or a tickling sensation in the neck, the only available action will be to look up at the blue sky one last time.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Queen Bee
对所有敌人造成 !D! 点伤害, 抽 !M! 张卡.
此卡被打出后, 将随机感染3张卡. 被感染的卡在下回合结束时被消耗, 并将1张工蜂加入抽牌堆.
被感染的卡打出后可以解除感染. 因工蜂而消耗卡牌时, 将新的工蜂加入抽牌堆.
(被感染的卡在手中时泛光为黄色)

Bloodbath.NAME: T-05-51
Bloodbath.DESCRIPTION: Many hands float in the bath. These are the hands of people I once loved.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Bloodbath
恢复 !M! 生命.
回合结束时若此卡在你手中, 随机消耗1张其它手牌, 并使恢复量+1(最多3).
若因此卡消耗的卡达到3张, 打出时随机消耗1张卡并将计数清零.

Wellcheers.NAME: F-05-52
Wellcheers.DESCRIPTION: Somewhere in the distance, you hear seagulls.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Opened Can of Wellcheers
The red can drink has a distinctive aroma and sweetness, and it can heighten the energy.
The blue aluminum can contains an odorless liquid with strong carbonic acid is effective in restoring mental strength.
If someone offers you an opened can of grape-flavored soda, you must reject it.

Alriune.NAME: T-04-53
Alriune.DESCRIPTION: With her hope to return to dust, It will return to grave with everything that desire to live.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Alriune
Uncontrollable: 弃置此卡.
若在弃置后3回合内抽到此卡, 对所有敌人造成 !D! 点伤害.
否则将消耗同一牌堆中的所有卡.

Murderer.NAME: T-01-54
Murderer.DESCRIPTION: But what's really pitiful is those like you dying in the hands of the likes of me.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Forsaken Murderer
将 !M! 张随机卡从弃牌堆加入手牌.
若此卡回合结束在你手中, 给予你5点伤害.

GalaxyChild.NAME: O-01-55
GalaxyChild.DESCRIPTION: The child's tear dropped, as a star came down from the sky. The world fell into a sleep, as it was trapped in ecstatic lullaby.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The Child of Galaxy
所有手牌费用减少 [E] .
若此卡本回合未被打出, 回合结束时费用+1.(最高为5)
若此卡在回合结束时费用高于4, 将本场战斗中因此卡降低过费用的所有卡 消耗 .

PunishingBird.NAME: O-02-56
PunishingBird.DESCRIPTION: People have been committing sins from a long time ago. "Why do they commit such a thing? Even when they know that it is bad"
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Little Bird
Punishing Bird
每个回合结束时对你造成1点伤害.
若你回合结束时你身上有负面状态, 改为为你恢复2点生命.
打出此卡时对你造成100点伤害.

Mercenary.NAME: F-01-57
Mercenary.DESCRIPTION: I will hang his head over my bed. Only then I can fall asleep without having a nightmare.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Little Red Riding Hooded Mercenary
战斗开始时额外抽1张卡. 若你生命不足一半, 你造成的伤害提升40%.
你每消耗3张卡, 使你获得3层流血.(每回合结束失去2点生命)
抽到此卡时若你手中有F-02-58, 将其 消耗 .

BigBadWolf.NAME: F-02-58
BigBadWolf.DESCRIPTION: Actually I didn't really care. I must be called Big Bad Wolf.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Big and Might be Bad Wolf
若你生命不足一半, 你造成的伤害提升40%.
若回合结束此卡在你手中, 随机吞下1张抽牌堆中的卡. 将此卡打出可以返还1张卡.
若抽到此卡时你处于F-01-57的流血效果, 立刻触发上1效果.
或许可以通过F-01-57来取回被吞的卡.(战斗结束时未取回的卡将从卡组移除)

UniverseFragment.NAME: O-03-60
UniverseFragment.DESCRIPTION: You see a singing in front of your eyes. It is very splendid, and it approaches you...
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Fragment of the Universe
获得 !B! 点 格挡 .
战斗开始时给予你1层 人工制品 .
当此卡被消耗时给予你 混乱 .

CrumblingArmor.NAME: O-05-61
CrumblingArmor.DESCRIPTION: Life is only given to those who do not fear death.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Crumbling Armor
获得 !B! 点 格挡 . 虚无 .
此卡消耗时, 给予你 !M! 点 力量 , 并将1张复制加入你的抽牌堆.
若你曾 消耗 过此卡, 打出技能卡时你会受到伤害.
每当你 消耗 此卡, 伤害将会提高, 同时将提高此卡的 格挡 .

LongBird.NAME: O-02-62
LongBird.DESCRIPTION: Its scale tilted according to the sins committed.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Long Bird
Bird of Judgement
使目标失去其最大生命 !M! %的生命, 最低为6.(失去 !D! 生命)
Uncontrollable: 消耗 手中所有的 状态 和 诅咒 .
因此卡效果而 消耗 卡时, 每张使你失去5点生命.

ApocalypseBird.NAME: O-02-63
ApocalypseBird.DESCRIPTION: A bird that is known to come when the world is filled with sins.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Apocalypse Bird
每当你打出5张卡, 对所有敌人造成 !M! 点伤害.

GreedKing.NAME: O-01-64
GreedKing.DESCRIPTION: Sadness shall say, "Be gone! Die!" But desire wants eternity. An immortality that can never be abolished.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Magical Girl
The King of Greed
每当你打出8张攻击卡, 获得 !M! 点 力量 .
回合结束时若此卡在你手中, 消耗 此卡左侧的所有手牌.

LittlePrince.NAME: O-04-66
LittlePrince.DESCRIPTION: Even if this is my curse, I will love this curse as a blessing.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Giant Mushroom
The Little Prince
战斗开始时给予你 混乱 .
不可控: 所有手牌费用-1.
战斗开始时随机标记4张卡, 将其打出后可以消除标记.(被标记的卡在手中时泛光为深蓝色)
在第3回合结束时, 随机1张被标记的卡变为"小王子-1", 其余被标记的卡将被 消耗 .

Laetitia.NAME: O-01-67
Laetitia.DESCRIPTION: So she came up with this brilliant idea!
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Laetitia
此卡在你手中时, 你打出的卡都将获得一份小小的礼物.
带有礼物的卡费用-1.
若此卡不在你手中, 打出带有礼物的卡将会将其 消耗 并给予你6点伤害.

Funeral.NAME: T-01-68
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Funeral of the Dead Butterflies
Uncontrollable: 抽1张卡, 恢复 !M! 点生命, 获得 !B! 点格挡, 给予所有敌人 !D! 点伤害.
当此卡在你手中时, 你所 消耗 的卡将从卡组移除.
当此卡在你手中时, 你所 消耗 的卡同时将从卡池移除.

Freischutz.NAME: F-01-69
Freischutz.DESCRIPTION: This magical bullet truly can hit anyone you say!
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Der Freischütz
右键此卡可以花费金钱的10%(至少10)来打出1发子弹.(计数 !M! )
子弹可以对1个目标造成18点伤害(不能被提升). 随后计数+1.
第7发子弹将对你造成同等的伤害.

BlackSwan.NAME: F-02-70
BlackSwan.DESCRIPTION: What happens when the black swan wakes up from the dream of being a white swan?
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Dream of a Black Swan
Uncontrollable: 获得3点 荆棘 .(计数 !M! )
此卡计数为0时, 将1张"伊利亚"加入你的抽牌堆.
当达成一定条件时此卡计数-1. 每种条件只会减少1次计数. 以下几条内容皆为条件.
此卡被手动弃置; 回合结束时此卡在你手中; 消耗5张卡;
回合结束时带有负面状态; 失去3次生命.

DreamingCurrent.NAME: O-02-71
DreamingCurrent.DESCRIPTION: Tell the kid today's is going to be grape flavored candy. It's his favorite.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The Dreaming Current
为你恢复 !M! 点生命.
回合开始时将此卡置入你的手中.
若回合结束此卡在你的手中, 给予你15点伤害.

DespairKnight.NAME: O-01-73
DespairKnight.DESCRIPTION: All that remained was the hollow pride of a weathered knight.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Magical Girl
The Knight of Despair
使用后使你获得祝福: 本场战斗中获得的 格挡 提升50%.(此效果不叠加)
在祝福状态受到未被 格挡 的伤害将使你额外失去5点生命.
此卡被 消耗 时取消祝福.

NakedNest.NAME: O-02-74
NakedNest.DESCRIPTION: It can enter any hole of your body.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The Naked Nest
每回合结束给予你1层 多层护甲 .
回合结束时若此卡在你手中, 随机感染1张其它手牌.
被感染的牌将在下回合结束时失去原本的效果, 获得 消耗 , 并在抽到时对你造成4点伤害.
(被感染的卡在手中时泛光为绿色)

BodiesMountain.NAME: T-01-75
BodiesMountain.DESCRIPTION: The smiling faces are eerie and full of sorrow.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The Mountain of Smiling Bodies
你每 消耗 1张卡, 获得1力量并恢复1生命.
你每 消耗 3张卡, 此卡费用+1.(最高4)
若此卡费用高于1, 在打出时费用-1.
Uncontrollable: 若此卡费用高于1, 根据费用对你造成伤害.(2费4点, 3费10点, 4费50点)

FairyFestival.NAME: F-04-83
FairyFestival.DESCRIPTION: Everything will be peaceful while you are under the fairies' care.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Fairy Festival
为你恢复1点生命.
此卡打出后, 每回合结束时为你恢复1点生命.
激活上1效果后若打出其它异常, 结束效果并对你造成20点伤害.

MeatLantern.NAME: O-04-84
MeatLantern.DESCRIPTION: That’s not a flower, order all the employees to get away immediately.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Meat Lantern
每回合结束给予你 !B! 点 格挡 .
战斗开始时此卡将附着在另一张卡上, 如果打出被附着的卡, 给予你50点伤害.(附着的表现为上方有一朵小花)

Scarecrow.NAME: F-01-87
Scarecrow.DESCRIPTION: The city still remained beautiful and the emerald roads sparkled brighter than ever.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Scarecrow Searching for Wisdom
当你使用能力卡时为你恢复4点生命.
Uncontrollable: 随机消耗1张能力卡, 给予你6点 格挡 .

Variant.NAME: O-03-88
Variant.DESCRIPTION: The only advise that can be given is to be cautious and be aware of your surroundings.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Dimensional Refraction Variant
此卡被 消耗 时给予你2层 无实体 .
此卡被打出时对你造成14点伤害.

CENSORED.NAME: O-03-89
CENSORED.DESCRIPTION: If any system issue deletes the blur from the Abnormality, we will have to sincerely think of how to deal with the **.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: [#EC1507]「CENSORED」
当你受到伤害时, 恢复伤害值40%的生命.
打出此卡将随机消耗1张卡并为你恢复 !M! 点生命.
Uncontrollable: 随机给予你3层 虚弱 或 易伤 .
Uncontrollable: 若你身上的负面状态高于6层, 消耗此卡外所有手牌.

ShyLook.NAME: O-01-92
ShyLook.DESCRIPTION: Good day today! Are you still shy today?
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Shy Look Today
获得 !B! 点 格挡 .
此卡上方的表情会随时间不断变化. 获得的 格挡 将根据上方的表情变化.
变化的数值为: +12, +6, +1, -6, -12.(负数的格挡将改为伤害)

BlueStar.NAME: O-03-93
BlueStar.DESCRIPTION: We will meet again as stars
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Blue Star
每回合开始时额外获得 [E] .
打出此卡对随机目标造成等同当前能量次的 !D! 点固定伤害.(第1次伤害为指定目标)
若回合结束时你没有剩余能量, 随机消耗2张卡.
若回合结束时你没有剩余手牌, 受到12点伤害.

Porccubus.NAME: O-02-98
Porccubus.DESCRIPTION: Now it's time for my head to burst. Good day.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Porccubus
Uncontrollable: 抽 !M! 张卡.
若抽卡后你的手牌高于6张, 获得1层 易伤 .
若回合结束此卡在你手中, 消耗 此卡外的所有手牌.

VoidDream.NAME: T-02-99
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Void Dream
获得1层 无实体 .
你的具有 虚无 的卡将在打出时被 消耗 .
打出此卡时使随机卡获得 虚无 .
虚无.

CherryBlossoms.NAME: O-04-100
CherryBlossoms.DESCRIPTION: The more blood it has, the more beautiful it is.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Grave of Cherry Blossoms
打出3次后将随机 消耗 5张卡.
第4次打出时将使你恢复 !M! 点生命并移除此卡.

FieryBird.NAME: O-02-101
FieryBird.DESCRIPTION: Those who succeeded in hunt are granted with the feather that countless hunters yearned.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Fiery Bird
对所有单位造成 !D! 点伤害.
此卡打出时费用+1, 未打出的回合结束时费用-1.(最高为3)
此卡的伤害会根据费用而增加, 每点费用增加8点伤害.
若打出时此卡费用为2或你的生命低于25%, 给予你5层 再生 .
若此卡费用为3, 回合结束时将1张灼烧加入你的抽牌堆.
若此卡在费用为3的情况被打出, 立刻变为0费, 使你失去20点最大生命并获得Feather of Honor.

Yin.NAME: O-05-102
Yin.DESCRIPTION: Now, you become the sky, and I become the land.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Yin
获得1层 缓冲 .
当你激活"Yang"超过2个回合时, 此卡与"Yang"将分别变为1个敌对单位.
请不惜一切代价阻止"Yin"与"Yang"相接触.

LaLuna.NAME: D-01-105
LaLuna.DESCRIPTION: Tales say the moon bewitch man. But, in reality, man despairs at the moon.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: La Luna
Uncontrollable: 将现在的音乐暂时替换为"月光奏鸣曲", 如果已在"月光奏鸣曲"期间, 则不生效.
在"月光奏鸣曲"期间, 你获得1点 力量 和 敏捷 .
"月光奏鸣曲"的第三乐章将会持续更长时间并提供双倍加成, 但是期间每5秒将会使你受到2点伤害.

BlackArmy.NAME: D-01-106
BlackArmy.DESCRIPTION: The color of human heart is pink. By wearing the same color, we can blend into the people’s mind.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Army In Pink
Army In Black
打出后使你获得20%伤害减免, 每回合恢复1点生命, 此卡费用+1.(不能叠加)
你造成的伤害提升15%, 每消耗5张卡此卡费用+1.
当此卡费用高于2时将变为4张"Army in Black"(derive card)并加入抽牌堆.
当所有的"Army in Black"(derive card)被 消耗 后, 将1张0费的此卡返还回你的手中.

MeltingLove.NAME: D-03-109
MeltingLove.DESCRIPTION: … and my dear employees, I hope you all put on the gas masks that we distributed to you before we come in here.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Melting Love
指定卡获得爱心, 使其费用为0.
如果你的生命低于50%, 受到10点以上伤害时减少该伤害10点.(不存在爱心时失效)
回合结束时持有爱心卡同一卡组的随机卡变为Slime(derive card), 打出此卡将使此效果失效2回合.
如果持有爱心的卡被 消耗 , 所有的史莱姆将被 消耗 , 你失去15点生命.
此卡被 消耗 时将 消耗 持有爱心的卡和所有史莱姆, 但不触发伤害.

HeroicMonk.NAME: D-01-110
HeroicMonk.DESCRIPTION: However, if enough sarira to make everyone watch in awe come out from you, your name will be sung through generations.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Heroic Monk
每当你 消耗 1张卡, 抽1张卡.
若此卡回合结束在你手中, 将对你造成伤害, 数值等同你本场战斗 消耗 的卡数的2倍.
此卡被消耗时对你造成25点伤害.

TheresiaRelic.NAME: T-09-09
TheresiaRelic.DESCRIPTION: Remember this melody? The professor played this song when the students were sleepy. Happy birthday.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Theresia

TouchMeRelic.DESCRIPTION: 你已经按过很多次了, 你丫到底还想知道些什么?
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 别碰我

AspirationHeartRelic.NAME: T-09-77
AspirationHeartRelic.DESCRIPTION: Excessive aspiration will result in a frenzy.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The Heart of Aspiration

ResearcherNoteRelic.NAME: T-09-78
ResearcherNoteRelic.DESCRIPTION: The final chapter ends with a sentence, "Born again".
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Note from a Crazed Researcher

FleshIdolRelic.NAME: T-09-79
FleshIdolRelic.DESCRIPTION: And the prayer always ends with eternal despair of the worshipper.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Flesh Idol

TreeSapRelic.NAME: T-09-80
TreeSapRelic.DESCRIPTION: The tree reaped from what it sowed.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Giant Tree Sap

AdjustmentMirrorRelic.NAME: O-09-81
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Mirror of Adjustment

ChangeAnythingRelic.NAME: T-09-85
ChangeAnythingRelic.DESCRIPTION: Now everything will be just fine!
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: We Can Change Anything

HellTrainRelic.NAME: T-09-86
HellTrainRelic.DESCRIPTION: When the time comes, the train chugs down the tracks and sounds its mighty horn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Express Train to Hell

SkinProphecyRelic.NAME: T-09-90
SkinProphecyRelic.DESCRIPTION: Save us now and forevermore. The truth shall set us free!
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Prophecy of the Skin

LuminousBraceletRelic.NAME: O-09-95
LuminousBraceletRelic.DESCRIPTION: This bracelet does not forgive those with greed so it should be only be worn by those in need.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Luminous Bracelet

BehaviorAdjustmentRelic.NAME: O-09-96
BehaviorAdjustmentRelic.DESCRIPTION: Eventually they will lose all Prudence and even forget how to exist.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Behavior Adjustment

BackwardClockRelic.NAME: D-09-104
BackwardClockRelic.DESCRIPTION: Have you fallen to the lowest bottom?
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Backward Clock

SilentSonata.NAME: Silent Sonata
SilentSonata.DESCRIPTION: Conductors are magicians that imbue life into things. A shaman that calls for souls.

SilentAdagio.NAME: Silent Adagio
SilentAdagio.DESCRIPTION: Performers live off of applauses from the audience.

SilentScherzo.NAME: Silent Scherzo
SilentScherzo.DESCRIPTION: The sensational look of The Silent Orchestra's conductor will captivate everyone.

SilentRondo.NAME: Silent Rondo
SilentRondo.DESCRIPTION: Applauses are what drives the lives of the performers.

SilentFinal.NAME: Silent Final
SilentFinal.DESCRIPTION: A standing ovation is the finest compliment that an audience can offer when they listened to a marvelous piece.

Duel.NAME: Duel!
Duel.DESCRIPTION: The ones who know the cruelty of winter and the aroma of rose.

GuardApostle.NAME: Guard Apostle
GuardApostle.DESCRIPTION: 若与WhiteNight同时在手牌中, 消耗 打出的所有非"Sacred"卡. 消耗 .

ScytheApostle.NAME: Scythe Apostle
ScytheApostle.DESCRIPTION: 回合结束时此卡若在你的手牌中, 消耗 手中的所有非"Sacred"卡. 消耗 .

WandApostle.NAME: Wand Apostle
WandApostle.DESCRIPTION: 当此卡在你手牌中时, 消耗你所打出的非"Sacred" 技能 卡. 消耗 .

SpearApostle.NAME: Spear Apostle
SpearApostle.DESCRIPTION: 当此卡在你手牌中时, 消耗你所打出的非"Sacred" 攻击 卡. 消耗 .

HereticApostle.NAME: The Heretic
HereticApostle.DESCRIPTION: Have I not chosen you, the Twelve? Yet one of you is a devil.

WorkerBee.NAME: Worker Bee
WorkerBee.DESCRIPTION: 回合结束时若在你手牌中, 随机 消耗 1张手牌. 消耗 .

Sheep.NAME: Sheepskin
Sheep.DESCRIPTION: ...That’s why I could slash the wolf’s belly and returned safely back here!

PrinceOne.NAME: Little Prince-1
PrinceOne.DESCRIPTION: Uncontrollable: 给予你5点伤害. 消耗 .

Elijah.NAME: Elijah
Elijah.DESCRIPTION: Uncontrollable: 随机 消耗 1张卡. 此卡在你手中时, 每当你造成伤害, 你会受到相同的伤害. 消耗 .

BlackArmyDerive.NAME: Army in Black
BlackArmyDerive.DESCRIPTION: Uncontrollable: 给予你10点伤害, 消耗 .

MeltingSlime.NAME: Slime
MeltingSlime.DESCRIPTION: 为所有敌人恢复 !M! 点生命, 消耗 . Uncontrollable: 给予你2点伤害.

Apo_Beam.NAME: Dark Beam
Apo_Beam.DESCRIPTION: 清空目标的护甲, 使其失去 !D! 点生命, 给予 !M! 层 易伤 .

Apo_Charge.NAME: Charge
Apo_Charge.DESCRIPTION: 对所有敌人造成 !D! 点伤害.

Apo_Execute.NAME: Execute
Apo_Execute.DESCRIPTION: 造成999伤害, 只能对100血以下的敌人使用.

Apo_SoulSlash.NAME: Soul Slash
Apo_SoulSlash.DESCRIPTION: 使目标失去 !D! 生命, 并减少等额生命上限, 进行2次.

Apo_Pray.NAME: Pray
Apo_Pray.DESCRIPTION: 在战斗结束时恢复你全部的生命, 此卡使用后将被移除.

HpAim.NAME: HP Recovery Bullet
HpAim.DESCRIPTION: 恢复 !M! 点生命. 消耗 .

WhiteAim.NAME: Trauma Shield
WhiteAim.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 层 人工制品 .

BlackAim.NAME: Erosion Shield
BlackAim.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 层 多层护甲 . 消耗 .

PaleAim.NAME: Pale Shield
PaleAim.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 层 无实体 . Erase.

SlowAim.NAME: Movement Reduction Bullet
SlowAim.DESCRIPTION: 给予 !M! 层 虚弱 和 易伤 .

ExecuteAim.NAME: Execution Bullet
ExecuteAim.DESCRIPTION: 造成999伤害, 只能对生命低于 !D! 的目标使用. Erase.

Malkuth.NAME: Control Team
Malkuth.DESCRIPTION: 将Control Team order加入你的卡组.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: TT2 Protocol
将TT2 Protocol加入你的卡组.
Joint Command
Control Team order允许选择抽牌堆/弃牌堆中的卡.
Summon Call
将Summon Call加入你的卡组.

Yesod.NAME: Information Team
Yesod.DESCRIPTION: 将Information Team order加入你的卡组.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: G.O Visualization
显示生命和状态.
Normalization of Damage
显示敌方意图.
Abnormality Countermeasure Manual
你每获得1张Abnormality card将为你提高4点最大生命.

Netzach.NAME: Security Team
Netzach.DESCRIPTION: 将Security Team order加入你的卡组.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Regenerating Mk2
提高Security Team order的生命恢复.
Mental Corruption Neutralizing Gas
Security Team order生效时将随机移除卡组中的诅咒.
Regenerator Distinguisher Modification
Security Team order将在每回合结束为你恢复少量生命.

Hod.NAME: Training Team
Hod.DESCRIPTION: 将Training Team order加入你的卡组.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Supply Educational Manuals
战斗开始时给予你1点 力量 和 敏捷 .
Reinforce Work Education
Training Team order将允许选择抽牌堆/弃牌堆中的卡.
Reinforce Hiring Procedure
战斗开始时额外给予你2点 力量 和 敏捷 .

Tiphereth.NAME: Central Command Team
Tiphereth.DESCRIPTION: 将Central Command Team order加入你的卡组.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Physical Intervention Shield
Unlock Physical Intervention Shield.
Trauma Shield
Unlock Trauma Shield.
Erosion Shield
Unlock Erosion Shield.

Chesed.NAME: Welfare Team
Chesed.DESCRIPTION: 将Welfare Team order加入你的卡组.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: HP-N Bullet
Unlock HP-N Bullet.
SP-E Bullet
Unlock SP-E Bullet.
Refine HP, SP Bullet
提升HP-N Bullet的效果2点, SP-E Bullet现在可以选择1张卡消耗.

Geburah.NAME: Disciplinary Team
Geburah.DESCRIPTION: 将Disciplinary Team order加入你的卡组.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Qliphoth Intervention Field
Unlock Qliphoth Intervention Field.
Execution Bullet
Unlock Execution Bullet.
Rabbit Team
允许你额外部署2次Rabbit Team.

Hokma.NAME: Record Team
Hokma.DESCRIPTION: 将Record Team order加入你的卡组.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Virtue of Protection
给予你额外的1个药水栏位.
Virtue of Governance
战斗结束获得的金钱提高50%.
Virtue of Creation
获得奖励时额外获得1个卡牌奖励.

Binah.NAME: Extraction Team
Binah.DESCRIPTION: 将Extraction Team order加入你的卡组.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: E.G.O. Restoration
选择卡牌奖励时可选卡牌增加1个.
Re-extraction
开放再提取功能.
GIFT Division
卡牌奖励中出现的卡全部升级.

ControlCode.NAME: Control Team order
ControlCode.DESCRIPTION: 选择 !M! 张手牌, 将它们的费用在本回合內减少 [E] .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 选择 !M! 张卡, 将它们的费用在本回合內减少 [E] .

InformationCode.NAME: Information Team
InformationCode.DESCRIPTION: 检视牌堆顶的 !M! 张牌, 选择任意张丢弃.

SecurityCode.NAME: Security Team order
SecurityCode.DESCRIPTION: 战斗结束时若此卡仍存在, 为你恢复 !M! 点生命.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 战斗结束时若此卡仍存在, 为你恢复 !M! 点生命并随机移除1张 诅咒 .
战斗结束时若此卡仍存在, 为你恢复 !M! 点生命并随机移除1张 诅咒 . 回合结束时若此卡仍存在, 为你恢复完整恢复量25%的生命.

TrainingCode.NAME: Training Team order
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 选择 !M! 张卡升级.

CentralCode.NAME: Central Command Team order
CentralCode.DESCRIPTION: 弃置手中的所有子弹, 每张给予你 !B! 点 格挡 .

DisciplinaryCode.NAME: Disciplinary Team order
DisciplinaryCode.DESCRIPTION: 选择至多 !M! 张卡 消耗 . 消耗 .(不限手牌)

RecordCode.NAME: Record Team order
RecordCode.DESCRIPTION: 选择至多 !M! 张消耗堆的卡加入手牌.

ExtractionCode.NAME: Extraction Team order
ExtractionCode.DESCRIPTION: 胜利后获得额外的卡牌奖励. 消耗 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 胜利后获得指定异想体的E.G.O.

TT2Protocol.NAME: TT2 Protocol
TT2Protocol.DESCRIPTION: 从左至右打出你的所有手牌, 目标随机.

SummonCall.NAME: Summon Call
SummonCall.DESCRIPTION: 升级所有Team order. 消耗 .

ExpandDepartment.NAME: 开放部门
ExpandDepartment.DESCRIPTION: 消耗5点LP, 选择开放一个部门进度.

FourthMatchFlame.NAME: Fourth Match Flame
FourthMatchFlame.DESCRIPTION: 此卡被消耗时, 对所有敌人造成 !D! 点伤害.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The fire will not go out until it has burned away the happiness, warmth, and other good things of the world.

Penitence.NAME: Penitence
Penitence.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 格挡 , 等同你已失去的生命的一半.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The thorns hurt as they anchor your soul in reality.

InTheNameOfLoveAndHate.NAME: In the Name of Love and Hate
InTheNameOfLoveAndHate.DESCRIPTION: 如果目标的意图是攻击并且你没有 格挡 ,获得 !B! 格挡 . 虚无 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I made my mind to love everything in the world, but what’s left is a broken hear.

BearPaw.NAME: Bear Paw
BearPaw.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 格挡 . 当此卡被弃置时, 你获得 !M! 力量 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Its warm memory of hugs was forgotten when it was thrown away.

BloodyDesire.NAME: Bloody Desire
BloodyDesire.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 格挡 与 !M! 力量 , 如果你下个回合开始前没有失去生命, 失去6点生命.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: However, obsession doesn't stop when blinded by avarice.

Loneliness.NAME: Loneliness
Loneliness.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 格挡 , 只有当此卡是你最后1张手牌时才可打出.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: To hide soft inside, arm yourself with loneliness.

ScreamingWedge.NAME: Screaming Wedge
ScreamingWedge.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 格挡 , 所有敌人失去 !M! 点 力量 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Only iron-willed employees can use this without side effects.

Mimicry.NAME: Mimicry
Mimicry.DESCRIPTION: 你不会再受到荆棘伤害或者生命流失.
Mimicry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 .你不会再受到荆棘伤害或者生命流失.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Even though it is not the skin of a human, the skin that is akin to it protects us.

Noise.NAME: Noise
Noise.DESCRIPTION: 抽 !M! 张卡, 使它们的费用随机变为0-3.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: As if taking you to the very moment of the day that everyone forgot.

Harmony.NAME: Harmony
Harmony.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 伤害. 本回合每 消耗 1张卡, 费用减少 [E] .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Art is the gift of the devil from despair and suffering.

DaCapo.NAME: Da Capo
DaCapo.DESCRIPTION: 打出本回合打出过的所有卡, 目标随机. 消耗 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It would be wise to leave some audience alive until the finale to hear them applaud.

Logging.NAME: Logging
Logging.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 !M! 次.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 布满猩红痕迹的斧刃总是锋利无比.

FrostShard.NAME: Frost Shard
FrostShard.DESCRIPTION: 抽1张卡, 若抽到的卡是技能卡, 获得 !B! 格挡 并重复此卡效果.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 当冰雪消融的那天, 她冰封的内心也将一并融化.
不容
如果此卡效果抽到荣耀之羽, 将其消耗

Lamp.NAME: Lamp
Lamp.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D!  点伤害, 若此卡杀死了敌人, 将此卡永久升级. 可被多次升级.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 那些明亮而炙热的眼睛总是同时注视着一处.

GrinderMk4.NAME: Grinder Mk4
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 然而机械的叛乱早已不是现代社会的威胁.

GreenStem.NAME: Green Stem
GreenStem.DESCRIPTION: 你的 格挡 不再会在回合开始时消失.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 当它意识到无人将会归来时, 就像变魔法一样, 它伸展出了自己的枝干和茎叶.

RedEyes.NAME: Red Eyes
RedEyes.DESCRIPTION: 如果目标的意图是攻击, 获得 !M! 点 力量 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 即使在黑暗中, 它的眼睛也能死死咬住目标.

Horn.NAME: Horn
Horn.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 伤害, 等同你失去的生命的一半.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 绽放的花朵因为仇恨而将永远绽放.

ParadiseLost.NAME: Paradise Lost
ParadiseLost.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 伤害. 打出后选择获得一项特殊强化. 可被多次 升级 .
ParadiseLost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 伤害, 获得 !B! 格挡 . 打出后在本场战斗中获得一项特殊强化. 可被多次 升级 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我乃死, 我乃生. 我为暗, 我亦为光.
祷告
如果你的卡组中存在白夜, 你可以在篝火处选择进行此卡的特殊强化.
护体
给予你10 格挡 .
真言
给予的伤害改为生命流失.
冥思
随机移除你的1个负面状态.
净化
消耗所有的 状态 和 诅咒 .
振奋
抽2张卡.
鼓舞
升级其余手牌.
神迹
使随机手牌费用减少 [E] .
朴实
此卡费用不会高于2.
眩目
给予目标2层 易伤 .
隐秘
获得 保留 .
劝戒
给予目标2层 虚弱 .
福音
恢复4点生命.
幸运
战斗奖励增加15金币.
甘霖
战斗奖励增加随机药水.
庇佑
获得1层 人工制品 .
退化
目标失去2点 力量 .
允诺
获得 固有 .
信仰
将此卡 升级 .

Christmas.NAME: Christmas
Christmas.DESCRIPTION: 每当你消耗1张卡, 将1张随机卡加入你的手牌.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 曾经想成为一个好孩子的小小梦想...现在还仍在你心中吗?

Hornet.NAME: Hornet
Hornet.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. 若你身上没有负面状态, 伤害翻倍.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 旧日的荣耀仍在继续绽放光辉.

WristCuter.NAME: Wrist Cuter
WristCuter.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害, 目标每次受到攻击时失去 !M! 点生命.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 刀刃会将追求幸福的意志一并撕裂, 而这将永不停止.

Soda.NAME: Soda
Soda.DESCRIPTION: 每当你打出3张卡, 恢复1点生命.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 当使用它时, 葡萄汽水的香甜似乎也会一并喷发出来.

Reverberation.NAME: Reverberation
Reverberation.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害. 若此卡被弃置, 获得 !B! 点 格挡 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 任何裂隙都能够被花簇填满.

Regret_ego.NAME: Regret
Regret_ego.DESCRIPTION: 每当你消耗1张卡, 获得1层 金属化 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 对一个连葬礼都没有的人而言, 唯有深深的悔恨才是最好的悼唁.

Galaxy.NAME: Galaxy
Galaxy.DESCRIPTION: 如果你手中没有其它技能, 获得 !B! 点 格挡 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 你手中的鹅卵石闪耀着, 摇曳着, 抖动着. 在那之后, 它便成为了整个银河.

Beak.NAME: Beak
Beak.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 伤害. 如果你本回合失去过生命, 伤害变为4倍.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 它不会宽恕那些阻碍自己前进的蠢货.

CrimsonScar.NAME: Crimson Scar
CrimsonScar.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 伤害. 如果你的手牌中有郁蓝创痕, 将其 消耗 并使本次伤害翻倍.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 因为狂怒而盲目, 失去理智, 对杀戮果断而坚决, 那也总比因为懦弱而恐惧要好太多!

BlueScar.NAME: Blue Scar
BlueScar.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 格挡 . 如果你的手牌中有猩红创痕, 将其 消耗 并使本次 格挡 翻倍.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 它们只会让你的痛觉变得迟钝, 但是无法保护你的身体.

Tough.NAME: Tough
Tough.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 伤害. 如果你的抽牌堆中没有卡, 额外造成2次伤害.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 它只能被发型简单, 清爽的人士使用...那就是秃子! 光头! 大吴克!

SomewhereSpear.NAME: Somewhere Spear
SomewhereSpear.DESCRIPTION: 抽到此卡时, 此卡获得随机手牌的基础效果.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 不要想着去理解它, 只是这样使用它就可以了.

LifeForTheDareDevil.NAME: Life For The Dare Devil
LifeForTheDareDevil.DESCRIPTION: 固有 . 消耗 所有技能卡. 如果此卡消耗了技能卡, 获得 !M! 点 金属化 和 力量 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 如果让有赴死之心的人使用, 它便会无往不利.

Justitia.NAME: Justitia
Justitia.DESCRIPTION: 对所有敌人造成 !D! 伤害. 场上每个负面状态将使此卡伤害增加 !M! .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 不要试着移去上面的绷带, 它掩盖着那些属于过去的, 不应被人锁了解的悲哀记忆.

Twilight.NAME: Twilight
Twilight.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 伤害, 获得 !B! 格挡 , 抽 !M! 张卡, 获得 !M! 点 力量 和 敏捷 . 打出后从卡堆中移除.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 在那片昏暗的森林里, 鸟儿的叽喳鸣唱依旧响彻着吗?

GoldRush.NAME: Gold Rush
GoldRush.DESCRIPTION: 造成6点伤害. 在每回合开始时加入你的手牌.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 宝石美丽的金色光泽令人着迷, 这样的反应可能来自人类潜意识的深处.

Spore.NAME: Spore
Spore.DESCRIPTION: 发现1张卡, 本回合其费用为0. 消耗 .
Spore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 发现1张卡, 本回合其费用为0.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 对旧日的思恋远比肉体的痛苦更加悲惨, 因为它是无形之物, 无法阻挡.

Laetitia_ego.NAME: Laetitia
Laetitia_ego.DESCRIPTION: 你的手牌本回合获得保留.
Laetitia_ego.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 抽1张卡. 你的手牌本回合获得保留.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 精美的丝带和蝴蝶结寄托了少女对幸福的向往, 那个小孩不愿撇下她的朋友.

SolemnVow.NAME: Solemn Vow
SolemnVow.DESCRIPTION: 消耗堆中每有1张卡, 对所有敌人造成1次 !D! 伤害, 清空你的消耗堆. 消耗 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 用蝴蝶为那些长眠于不毛之地的人们献上哀悼吧.

MagicBullet.NAME: Magic Bullet
MagicBullet.DESCRIPTION: 对所有敌人造成 !D! 伤害, 消耗弃牌堆中所有的卡. 消耗 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 尽管无法完全提取异想体核心中那股深奥的力量, 但利用那神奇力量所研制出来的装备仍然无比强大.

BlackSwan_ego.NAME: Black Swan
BlackSwan_ego.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 荆棘 , 你每失去一次生命, 这张牌的耗能减少 [E] . 消耗 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 梦想总是美好的, 可现实始终那样残酷...

Ecstasy.NAME: Ecstasy
Ecstasy.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 点 力量 与 敏捷 , 弃置1张卡.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 色彩斑斓的花纹使你想起某个活泼可爱的孩子.

Heaven.NAME: Heaven
Heaven.DESCRIPTION: 不能被打出. 回合结束时对所有敌人造成 !D! 伤害.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 它就活在你的视线之中.

SwordSharpenedByTears.NAME: Sword Sharpened By Tears
SwordSharpenedByTears.DESCRIPTION: 你手中每有1张 技能 , 对所有敌人造成 !D! 伤害1次.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 泪如灰落, 绣如星宿.

ShedSkin.NAME: Shed Skin
ShedSkin.DESCRIPTION: 弃置X张卡, 每张获得 !M! 层 多层护甲 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 它的湿滑表面可能会使人感到恶心, 但这种多层次的鳞片结构正适合用来保护人们的身体.

TheSmile.NAME: The Smile
TheSmile.DESCRIPTION: 消耗堆中每有1张卡, 获得 !B! 点 格挡 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我经常听到那些怪异的呻吟, 但我只能选择忽视, 因为我无能为力.

Gaze.NAME: Gaze
Gaze.DESCRIPTION: 不能被打出. 回合结束时获得 !B! 点 格挡 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 门后的眼睛死死凝视着它的目标, 没人知道它到底想看到什么.

Wingbeat.NAME: Wingbeat
Wingbeat.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 , 升级1张手牌.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 这件装备并不像精灵的羽翼那样轻薄, 而要沉重许多.

Lantern.NAME: Lantern
Lantern.DESCRIPTION: 获得1层易伤, 本回合受到攻击时对攻击者造成 !D! 伤害.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 与黑暗中的温暖荧光相对的, 是那些令人恐惧的利齿.

Harvest.NAME: Harvest
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我们到现在也无法确认到底有多少人因为这支长耙而丧生.

Diffraction.NAME: Diffraction
Diffraction.DESCRIPTION: 失去 !M! 点生命, 获得1层无实体, 消耗 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 不要在乎那些荒谬的建议, 你应该用你的头脑去观察与感受它的样式.

CENSORED_ego.NAME: [CENSORED]
CENSORED_ego.DESCRIPTION: 所有敌人获得 !M! 层 虚弱 和 易伤 , 失去 !M! 点 力量 . 消耗 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 这[数据删除]可以被用来[数据删除], 但是会令看着[数据删除]的人感到严重的[数据删除].

TodaysExpression.NAME: Todays Expression
TodaysExpression.DESCRIPTION: 清空你所有的负面状态, 每层给予你 !B! 点 格挡 . 消耗 .(给予 !M! 格挡 )
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 当你觉得已经无法从面容上掩盖自己的情感时, 那就让我们来遮住你的脸吧.

SoundOfStar.NAME: Sound Of Star
SoundOfStar.DESCRIPTION: 消耗至多X张手牌, 获得等同它们费用的 [E] , 抽等量的卡. 消耗 .
SoundOfStar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 消耗至多X + 1张手牌, 获得等同它们费用的 [E] , 抽等量的卡. 消耗 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 如果你仔细凝视它, 那你必会醒悟——我们终有一天会回到那个地方.

Pleasure.NAME: Pleasure
Pleasure.DESCRIPTION: 获得1层 虚弱 , 抽2张卡. 将1张此卡的复制加入手牌. 只有当手牌中没有其它因乐癫狂时才可打出.
Pleasure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得1层 虚弱 , 抽2张卡. 将1张此卡的复制加入手牌. 虚无 . 只有当手牌中没有其它因乐癫狂时才可打出.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 寻求常人无法承受的快感通常会使人丧失自我.

RapturousDream.NAME: Rapturous Dream
RapturousDream.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 , 获得 !M! 层 脆弱 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 拂晓既出, 干渴难足. 闭目静待, 奈何难求.

CherryBlossom.NAME: Cherry Blossom
CherryBlossom.DESCRIPTION: 每当你消耗1张卡, 对随机敌人造成 !M! 伤害.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 不要对我留有思念. 当名为死亡的冬日逝去之时, 我将化作含苞待放的蓓蕾回到你的身边.

FeatherOfHonor.NAME: Feather Of Honor
FeatherOfHonor.DESCRIPTION: 抽1张卡, 若抽到的是攻击, 对所有敌人造成 !D! 伤害并重复此卡效果.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 能够穿透肉体的烈焰融化了寒冷的身躯与心灵.
不容
如果此卡效果抽到霜之碎片, 将其消耗.

Discord.NAME: Discord
Discord.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 . 反转你所有卡的费用.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 生的力量, 死的力量, 二者并无优劣之分. 这两种力量不过是表现出了它们本应表现的形态罢了.

Moonlight.NAME: Moonlight
Moonlight.DESCRIPTION: 弃置所有手牌, 每张对所有敌人造成 !D! 伤害并获得 !B! 格挡 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 终焉之刻, 吾等皆化身为月, 是以不堪凡躯也.

Pinks.NAME: Pinks
Pinks.DESCRIPTION: 使你手中所有卡的伤害与 格挡 增加 !M! .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 粉红色象征着温暖与爱.

CUTE.NAME: CUTE
CUTE.DESCRIPTION: 打出你牌堆顶的卡, 目标随机. 消耗 .
CUTE.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 打出你牌堆顶的卡, 目标随机.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 这些果冻状的爪爪垫摸起来真是让人欲罢不能啊, 简直爽到~

Hypocrisy.NAME: Hypocrisy
Hypocrisy.DESCRIPTION: 抽 !M! 张卡, 弃置其中费用为0的卡.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 但是他们浑然不知——大自然可不懂得祝福与诅咒的区别.

Adoration.NAME: Adoration
Adoration.DESCRIPTION: 选择1张手牌, 将其的2张复制加入你的手牌. 消耗 .
Adoration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 选择1张卡, 将其的2张复制加入你的手牌. 消耗 .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 触碰黏液的人会抱怨皮肤上那股怪异的感觉, 然而它绝不会止步于此.

Amita.NAME: Amita
Amita.DESCRIPTION: 消耗你牌堆顶的卡, 获得3倍于其费用的能量. 消耗 .
Amita.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 消耗你牌堆顶的卡, 获得3倍于其费用的能量.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我愿意相信, 在承受这诸多苦难之后, 我终将修成真果.
